document_data.name: Owlbear Cub
document_data.mainbody: This '''owlbear cub''' was an [[owlbear]] who lived on the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The cub and the dog [[Scratch (dog)|Scratch]] would become fast and inseparable friends, chasing each other around camp, were they both to join the [[Absolute Adversaries]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the cub and his mother lived in a cave near the [[Risen Road]] and [[Moonhaven]]. The cub had an older brother, but his mother ate him.

After his mother's death, the cub was captured by a band of [[goblin]]s who were loyal to [[the Absolute]]. After it ate a chicken the goblins used in their chicken chasing game, the cub was used as a replacement.
